participant_1.background:
I think my family would be surprised and confused, but ultimately supportive.
My daily routine consists of eating Italian food at home, as it's my favorite cuisine.
i like to draw and paint in my spare time.
i enjoy walking for exercise.
i live in huge mansion.

participant_2.background:
I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea.
i am a gourmet cook.
I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday and then pretend to be a superhero with my kids.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
i practice yoga daily.

content.text: I love Italian food! I love to cook it myself, I'm not a chef but I love trying new recipes.
Me too! I'm a gourmet cook, so I'm always trying new things. I'm going to cook a steak tonight for dinner, I'm excited to try it out.
That sounds delicious! I love steak, it's one of my favorite foods. I'm going to watch the Nascar race on Sunday, it should be a good one.
Nascar is so much fun, I'm going to watch it too! I'm going to pretend to be a superhero with my kids, they love that.
That sounds like a lot of fun, I wish I had kids. I love to draw and paint, I'm going to do some of that in my spare time this weekend.
I love to draw and paint too! I practice yoga daily, it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
Yoga is great, I used to do it a lot but I fell out of the habit. I'm going to start doing it again, it's so good for you.
